name: An Op.GG Darkly
description: Dark styles for op.gg (LoL, not Overwatch or PUBG). See "Advanced Style Options" for more color themes.
additional_info:
v1.21 @ 2017-11-10: Fix graphs (kinda) and MMR view
v1.2 @ 2017-11-10: Fix colors for new runes pages
v1.1: Fix colors on main page, search (recents/favorites).
v1.0: Initial release.
